Title: [ANN] [DAXT] The token that gives access to compliant, high quality ICOs

You can learn more about our token #DAXT, the sale and the process involved here: https://www.newsbtc.com/press-releases/february-10th-blockex-launches-ico/

Author: coupable
Title: [ANN] [DAXT] The token that gives access to compliant, high quality ICOs
Body: In my opinion, one of the biggest news for the crypto-system developement was announced few days ago by BlockEx which is a partenership with GB-Capital-Markets.Inc that will provide issuers access to the BlockExMarkets.com exchange platform in order to accept US institutional customers in a compliant manner. This will regulate access to European ICOs for US investors. This announecement was published here : https://www.blockex.com/news/blockex-and-gb-capital-markets-inc-partner-to-open-blockexmarkets-com-to-us-accredited-investors    When there is no bounty programmed for the ICO, the big percentage of users (bounty hunters) would think the same as you. In the case of BlockEx, i think that community lost the opportunity to know about BlockEx by not searching enough about details. Otherwise, this thread has been always here but as we there is no solid critcs or strong view-points in the posts above, not because users are fewly coming to this thread to communicate but because the project is solid enough and focusing more on product progress rather than answering noob questions. Anybody can always track updates in official telegram group: https://t.me/joinchat/Gd9vyg-VVGdY6uP--TIk0w

Author: BlockEx
Title: [ANN] [DAXT] The token that gives access to compliant, high quality ICOs
Body: BlockEx Disrupting the Way the World Trades  Launching the BlockEx ICO Market - A new standard, a new market for ICOs  Who Are BlockEx?  The BlockEx Digital Asset Exchange Platform (DAxP) manages the entire lifecycle of blockchain based digital assets. It has toolkits for asset creation, servicing, trade settlement, permissioned trading and automated reporting. Currently it is launching the BlockEx ICO Market. This will provide a full end-to-end compliant ICO product offering to companies wishing to launch an ICO. BlockEx will bring the governance and legal framework of its regulated activities to the ICO landscape, to provide a safe marketplace for both issuers and participants. BlockEx’s DAxP is currently in production, so participants in the ICO can realise the utility of the token before end of year.  BlockEx already has traction, and is about to reach lift off!  • 3 billion GBP worth of ICOs in approval pipeline. • 1.8 billion GBP pipeline of blockchain bonds • 5 white label Brokerage clients • Accepted to FCA Sandbox to test bond issuance tools • Accepted to AIFC Sandbox for security based tokens • Partnership with large CSD for Golden Gate • Partnership with OpenText for blockchain trade finance   ICO Problems BlockEx Has Solved  The BlockEx ICO Market was created in response to problems in the current ICO landscape. The lack of AML and KYC on ICO buyers and sellers means ICOs can be used for money laundering, and participants in the market can be exposed to fraud. The volatility of cryptocurrencies creates risks for the issuers, who may not manage the funds they receive effectively, and for buyers, who face exchange rate risk. The lack of easy fiat funding options also creates problems. There is a lack of governance, and huge sums are being invested in ideas in white papers, with no promise that the product will materialise. Some cryptocurrency projects were halted for creating ICOs that behave like financial securities without proper authorisation. Fear, uncertainty and doubt have been created by past and current fraudulent ICOs. Moreover, the distribution of ICO tokens has been heavily relationship based. The issuers of ICOs generally have a relationship with early buyers, who get a larger allocation.   BlockEx ICO Market  The BlockEx ICO Market solves the aforementioned issues:  Pot Allocation System: The Pot Allocation System operates during the pre-sale of ICOs hosted on our platform. If a pre-sale is oversubscribed, tokens are allocated in proportion to the amount of funds subscribed, so everyone can get some tokens. Digital Asset Exchange Token (DAXT): Our ICO is offering the Digital Asset Exchange Token (DAXT). It gives holders access to the Pot Allocation System used during the pre-sale of ICOs hosted on our platform. AML, KYC, and Security: BlockEx maintains institutional grade AML, KYC and security policies for all services, products, and traders. Token Issuing Company and 3rd Party Treasury Management Services: Funds raised will be released in tranches as ICO issuers reach preset milestones. They will be actively managed to remove the risks created by cryptocurrencies' volatility. Internal Digital Asset Exchange Token (IDAXT): The IDAXT is an internal special purpose token that automatically transfers various funding methods (fiat or cryptocurrency) on-chain. Exchanging funds from multiple currencies will be risk-free and transparent, since it will happen on-chain. Full Fiat Onrails: Traders can fund their accounts by wire, credit card, or from an eWallet. Instant Secondary Market: BlockEx offers an instant secondary market post ICO, so holders can immediately begin trading their tokens.   The DAXT  The BlockEx DAXT gives its holder access to the Pot Allocation System during ICO pre-sales hosted on the BlockEx ICO Market. This means that it can be used to guarantee an allocation of high quality, compliant ICO tokens. If a pre-sale is oversubscribed, the Pot Allocation System allocates tokens in proportion to the amount of funds subscribed, so everyone can join the fun.  Tokenomics  Cap €35,700,000 Total Token Supply 130,000,000 Token Full Price €1 ERC223 Yes Pre-Sale Available Yes Institutional Pre-Sale 50% discount Public Pre-Sale 25% discount Funding Method BTC, ETH, Fiat Individual Cap None   Read Our White Paper  https://daxt.io/   Book of Work  BlockEx already has £3 billion worth of ICOs in approval pipeline. Here are some of the exciting ICOs that will only be available through the BlockEx ICO Market:  YO TOKEN - Turn social currency into digital currency. Simply send tokens using social media handles. Spend on mobile service on YOVO, the first tokenised mobile network, or anywhere, with a globally accepted payment card. YourBlock - Platform that helps the owners of data securely store it on the Ethereum blockchain. Service providers who have been given permission to access this information can use it to offer their services, while complying with data protection legislation. Howdoo - A decentralized messaging and social media platform for today’s generation. Leveraging the Ethereum blockchain, Howdoo is about the power of sharing, of maintaining control over your digital footprint, and of being actively rewarded for your contributions and engagement. Modex - Smart Contract Marketplace and app ecosystem that allows for easy, user friendly access to cryptocurrencies and smart contracts alike. Developers can monetize their skills by offering Smart Contract solutions to end-customers and contributors. Easily Smart Contracts that are audited, secure, and meet real-world needs.   Read About Our Team  https://daxt.io/#team   Roadmaps  ICO Roadmap  2017 Mid November - ICO Market launch Mid November - BoW Launch December 18th - ICO Pre-Sale January 26th - ICO Sale February 16th - ICO Closes 2018 Late February - DAXT Seasonal Offering   Business Roadmap  Expand services to the United States  2017 Q4 - Crypto/crypto exchange services 2018 Q1 - ICO Market Launch Q3 - Crypto/fiat exchange services Q4 - Launch DACT  Technological Roadmap   Completed Builds Exchange MVP Brokerage Platform Digital Asset Creation Tool Framework: Bond product using DACT framework, token offering product using DACT framework  Future Builds 2017 Q4 - Exchange: FIX protocol integration Q4 - Brokerage: leverage trading, social & copy trading 2018 Q1 - DACT: Golden Gate tool, trade finance, syndicated loans Q2 - ICO Market: Smart contract driven treasury management & g[covernance   Social Links  Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BlockExDAxP/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/BlockEx LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/blockex/ Telegram: https://t.me/BlockExICODiscussion Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/BlockEx/ Medium: https://medium.com/@BlockEx   BlockEx Website  www.blockex.com   How To Participate in the BlockEx ICO  1) Sign up at BlockEx Markets and complete account verification. Go through the standard trader KYC process to confirm your identity, and eligibility for the ICO participation. 2) Fund your account with either Fiat or Crypto. Once the pre-sale is open, create a trading account at blockexmarkets.com. 3) Commit to your purchase amount.

Author: BlockEx
Title: [ANN] [DAXT] The token that gives access to compliant, high quality ICOs
Body: BNB and DAXT are not 100% comparable, as they have different utilities. BNB offers discounts on secondary trading fees on Binance, DAXT offers a guaranteed allocation of ICO pre-sales hosted in the BlockEx ICO Market.
